34.title: Win Adventure
34.reason: Needs player state tracking (#102) and encounter system for villain spawning (#107)

102.title: Fully implement player cards
102.reason: Foundation issue - provides player/hero state tracking

103.title: Fully implement treasure cards
103.reason: Foundation issue - special encounters need treasure placement

107.title: Track remaining work to fully implement encounter cards

122.title: Implement status/condition and multi-step power card effects
122.reason: Foundation issue - provides status/condition system (soft dependency for #127 and #126)

123.title: Implement conditional effects and utility capabilities for power cards

124.title: Implement board tokens for power cards that create persistent entities
124.reason: Foundation issue - provides board token system needed for traps/hazards

125.title: Integrate and Test Remaining Encounter Mechanics (Display-Only â†’ Full Implementation)
125.reason: Integration issue - requires all encounter subsystems to be implemented first

126.title: Implement Tile, Monster Deck Manipulation, and Special Encounter Mechanics
126.reason: Needs treasure system (#103) for treasure placement and encounter tracking (#107)

127.title: Implement Trap and Hazard Systems for Encounter Cards
127.reason: Needs board token system (#124) for persistent trap/hazard markers

phase_1_foundation.description: Foundation issues with no blockers - can be worked on in parallel

dependency_comments.34:
## Dependencies

This issue is blocked by the following issues and should not be started until they are completed:

- [ ] #102 - Fully implement player cards (provides player/hero state tracking)
- [ ] #107 - Track remaining work to fully implement encounter cards (provides encounter system for villain spawning)

See [ISSUE_DEPENDENCIES.md](https://github.com/egirard/Ashardalon/blob/main/ISSUE_DEPENDENCIES.md) for the full dependency analysis.
dependency_comments.125:

- [ ] #107 - Track remaining work to fully implement encounter cards (meta-issue for tracking)

- [ ] #127 - Implement Trap and Hazard Systems for Encounter Cards

See [ISSUE_DEPENDENCIES.md](https://github.com/egirard/Ashardalon/blob/main/ISSUE_DEPENDENCIES.md) for the full dependency analysis.

See [ISSUE_DEPENDENCIES.md](https://github.com/egirard/Ashardalon/blob/main/ISSUE_DEPENDENCIES.md) for the full dependency analysis.
dependency_comments.127:

See [ISSUE_DEPENDENCIES.md](https://github.com/egirard/Ashardalon/blob/main/ISSUE_DEPENDENCIES.md) for the full dependency analysis.
